menus.description: Individual menu implementations for the CLI

main.py.description: CLI entry point and main menu routing

config.py.description: Configuration constants for project rules and code extensions

core.py.description: Shared CLI functions (menu rendering, key input, screen control)

rules.py.description: Project rules checking logic (file lengths, folder counts, claude.json)

rules_external.py.description: External tool checks (radon, ruff, bandit) with graceful degradation
